content.html:
AE/AF-LOCK MODE



OptionDescription
AE&AF ON WHEN PRESSINGExposure and/or focus will lock while the button is pressed.
AE&AF ON/OFF SWITCHExposure and/or focus will lock when the button is pressed and re- main locked until it is pressed again.
This option determines the behavior of the button to which
exposure and/or focus lock is assigned.

AWB-LOCK MODE


OptionDescription
AWB ON WHEN PRESSINGAuto white balance locks while the button is pressed.
AWB ON/OFF SWITCHPress the button once to lock auto white balance and again to end the lock.
Choose the behavior of function buttons assigned auto white
balance (AWB) lock. Auto white balance lock is used to lock white
balance at the value metered by the camera when AUTO is se-
lected for white balance.

APERTURE RING SETTING (A)


The
Setup
Menus

8


OptionDescription
AUTOThe camera adjusts aperture automatically.
COMMANDAperture can be adjusted using the front command dial.
Choose whether the front command dial can be used to adjust
aperture when aperture is set to A (auto).
228
content.markdown:
# AE/AF-LOCK MODE

This option determines the behavior of the button to which
exposure and/or focus lock is assigned.

| Option | Description |
| --- | --- |
| AE&AF ON WHEN PRESSING | Exposure and/or focus will lock while the button is pressed. |
| AE&AF ON/OFF SWITCH | Exposure and/or focus will lock when the button is pressed and re- main locked until it is pressed again. |


AWB-LOCK MODE

Choose the behavior of function buttons assigned auto white
balance (AWB) lock. Auto white balance lock is used to lock white
balance at the value metered by the camera when AUTO is se-
lected for white balance.

| Option | Description |
| --- | --- |
| AWB ON WHEN PRESSING | Auto white balance locks while the button is pressed. |
| AWB ON/OFF SWITCH | Press the button once to lock auto white balance and again to end the lock. |


APERTURE RING SETTING (A)

The
Setup
Menus

Choose whether the front command dial can be used to adjust
aperture when aperture is set to A (auto).

8

| Option | Description |
| --- | --- |
| AUTO | The camera adjusts aperture automatically. |
| COMMAND | Aperture can be adjusted using the front command dial. |


228
